column4: Hey folks, I'm currently trying to help a friend of mine just installing UBuntu (I'm on kubuntu). He has a vaio and he can't either set the laptop to "economy" or, better, control the fans speed. Does anyone know how to do that?
Think you need to install the Sony acpis....I had a similar issue.
I don't know that it's a package. . .I'm not sure, I actually just used a script to control brightness when battery power is being used...It came off the forums.
